## TGlComponentRenderer type

Gl entity renderer with extensions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TGlComponentRenderer<TCtx extends TGlContext, TExts extends TGlExtensionKeys> = IGlComponentRenderer<TCtx, TExts> & TPredicate<TGlHasExtension<TExts, "ANGLE_instanced_arrays">, IGlComponentInstancedRenderer, {}> & TPredicate<TIsGl2<TCtx>, IGlComponentInstancedRenderer, {}> & TPredicate<TGlHasExtension<TExts, "OES_vertex_array_object">, IGlComponentVAORenderer, {}> & TPredicate<TIsGl2<TCtx>, IGlComponentVAORenderer, {}>;
```
